note:
Ain't Dead Yet, She/her: Pan and not looking. Neurodiverse yet hugger, Disabled PITA,Lefty hippy-type, Yarn engineer (crocheter), Believer in NHS. Retired. Proudly Working class. Dislikes: leaving anywhere, prejudice, pollution,
Loves: Tea, SciFi, Furry fiction, kindle, chocolate, kindness. CliFi
Collects: diagnoses, hobbies, yarn

name: #ADHD
value: I know it, but waiting for my assessment.

name: #ClimateEmergencyNow, #ClimateCrisis
value: Angry and Scared, unable to protest, trying to do my bit whilst capitalism destroys the planet around us. I recommend you read @breadandcircuses@climatejustice.social for clarity on the subject.

name: Alt text for profile:
value: A 64 year old woman with short turquoise hair escaping from a turquoise beret. She wears glasses and odd earrings and is smiling lopsidedly.
